message: Bob, I'm pleased to offer you this exceptional product. Given its value and potential, I believe a starting price of $1,300,000 is fair. What are your thoughts?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I can offer $950,000 for the product.
Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but the value of this product is undeniable. I could consider coming down to $1,150,000. This is my final offer.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I can offer $1,050,000 for the product. This is my final offer.
